"A.P.242/3/31 11:30": "There are still so many enemies... We can't let them slow us down...!"
"...Let us begin, Tsukuriyo."
"I made it in time."
"Regius!"
"Thanks."
"Where are the others?"
"You need not thank me. This is part of our mission."
"We have limited communications in order to avoid giving away our positions. I know not how they fare."
"If we waited here, would we be able to join up with everyone?"
"I happened to land near to your location. That is why I was able to find you."
"We do not know the positions of the others. If you wish to meet with them, you ought make for the core."
"But <%me>, Matoi. Do not forget."
"Your current objective is not to gather your allies... It is to destroy Shiva."
"The other ARKS and Council members, myself included, are here to deliver you to your destination. That is our purpose."
"The future rests on this battle's outcome. Do not mistake your purpose..."
"However, you have brought us this far by doing what you believe to be right. That is undeniable."
"You have even found answers that Xiao's calculations could not... and saved countless lives."
"Therefore, I will say this... Proceed as you see fit."
"I offer you my blade in support of your decisions and your actions."
"My blade exists for your sake. May it may forge a path forward for you."
"Quest progress has been saved."
